items.title: Episode 06: Set Ideas Free

Izzy, Madi, and Rose discuss priorities, idea debt, and whether cats should be allowed in personal museums.

items.title: Episode 05: Time is an Illusion
items.content_html:
Izzy, Rose, and Madi talk about the culture of small businesses, how we think about time, and what time affects in our daily lives.

items.title: Episode 04: At Least One Thing
items.content_html:
Rose, Izzy, and Madi update each other on their ongoing projects, go through some feedback, and talk about how to be creative or productive for ourselves when work drains us.

Useful links:

  • Transloader
  • Izzy’s Knowledge Dashboard
  • Kathy Campbell: wonderful, amazing unicorn & friend
    • Conduit: one of Kathy’s podcasts wherein she and Jay Miller talk about productivity and feelings
  • Hungarian Mushroom Soup
    • The recipe Izzy used, though she substituted modern vegan alternatives for the dairy
  • Netflix: Disable Auto-Play Previews
  • Netflix: Next Episode
  • Farmhouse Vernacular
  • Happy Color

items.title: Episode 03: Chain of Guilt
items.content_html:
Madi, Izzy, and Rose discuss the interconnectedness of seemingly unrelated ideas, the chain of guilt hanging around all of our necks, and what it means to be a master.

Useful links:

  • Twelve Threads - Vihart
  • Spoon Theory
    • We don’t mention it in the episode, but our friend Grey sent us this tweet about another metaphor for the Spoon Theory that may work better for your brain.
  • Our friend Kym writes short and sweet book reviews and has a podcast with another dear friend, Skyler!

Where to find Above the Mess:

Follow us on Twitter!

Send us an email!

Madi’s website

- Our friend Kym writes [short and sweet book reviews](https://www.irrationalnotes.com) and [has a podcast](https://anchor.fm/find-my-dragon) with another dear friend, [Skyler](https://skylerblue.net)!

items.title: Episode 01: All the Things
items.content_html:
Madi, Izzy, and Rose talk about their active projects and productivity philosophies, then take a left turn into societal issues, all in the first episode.

Rosemary Orchard:

  • Rosemary’s Website
  • Rose also hosts Automators, Nested Folders, and iOS Today.

Izzy Miller:

  • Izzy’s Website
  • Austin Food Not Bombs 
  • Izzy’s Sunfish

Madi:

  • Madi’s website
  • Jinx & Belle 

Productivity Philosophies:

  • Getting Things Done by David Allen*
  • OmniFocus: The to-do app built for pros
    • And the book Rosemary co-wrote about it–a new edition is coming soon: Build Your OmniFocus Workflow
  • Taskheat: The personal task manager for determined people.
  • Drafts: Where Text Starts
  • how we spend our days - vlogbrothers
  • 1% Philosophy aka Marginal Gains Philosophy
  • The One Thing by Gary Keller & Jay Papasan*
  • Refuse to Choose by Barbara Sher*
  • How to Be Everything by Emilie Wapnick*
  • The Renaissance Soul by Margaret Lobenstine*

Where to find Above the Mess:

Follow us on Twitter!

Send us an email!

Links marked with an asterisk(*) are affiliate links through Bookshop.org, an online bookseller that supports your local bookstores!
